title: SEAFORT / MATTRESS NEST
description: (in front of double embrasure looking over the bay, into whirling window, ends check island task, shot was made here)

dialogueTree.title: Mattress Nest: "There's a rain-soaked mattress on a..."
dialogueTree.text: There's a rain-soaked mattress on a concrete slab, only half-covered by the crumbling roof. At the head of it -- double embrasures -- firing slits, like two eyes in the wall.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""B triple prime..." The lieutenant..."
links.text: "B triple prime..." The lieutenant lowers his voice, stepping closer with his hand on his gun. "This looks like a good place to shoot from."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This looks like a good place to ai..."
links.text: "This looks like a good place to aim from..." The lieutenant looks around. He steps closer with his hand on his gun.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "This is B triple prime -- on the is..."
links.text: This is B triple prime -- on the island... A nest.

links.title: You: "Inspect the mattress."
links.text: Inspect the mattress.

links.title: Mattress Nest: "A single-person mattress. Modern, c..."
links.text: A single-person mattress. Modern, civilian use. Brand name: Marjorie. There's a fuel stain on the cover, along with cigarette burns.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "And an empty can of beans on the gr..."
links.text: And an empty can of beans on the ground next to it -- filled to the brim with cigarette butts.

links.title: You: "Pick one out of the can."
links.text: Pick one out of the can.

links.title: Perception (Sight): "The silhouette of a tobacco picker..."
links.text: The silhouette of a tobacco picker adorns the paper filter. The brand: Tioumoutiri.

links.title: You: ""Tioumoutiri. Like the ones we foun..."
links.text: "Tioumoutiri. Like the ones we found at Land's End, remember?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. This guy gets around.""
links.text: "Yes. This guy gets around."

links.title: You: ""An old man's brand of cigarettes....."
links.text: "An old man's brand of cigarettes...."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes. It all adds up." He stares in..."
links.text: "Yes. It all adds up." He stares into the can for a second.

links.title: You: ""Our shooter's a heavy smoker.""
links.text: "Our shooter's a heavy smoker."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Noted." The lieutenant stares into..."
links.text: "Noted." The lieutenant stares into the can for a second.

links.title: You: "Say nothing, drop the cigarette bac..."
links.text: Say nothing, drop the cigarette back into the can.

links.title: You: ""Tioumoutiri. Like the ones we foun..."
links.text: "Tioumoutiri. Like the ones we found at Land's End, remember?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I may have been wrong -- when I sa..."
links.text: "I may have been wrong -- when I said it was unimportant." He stares into the can for a second. "This means the same person could have visited both locations."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I didn't see any signs of smoking..."
links.text: "I didn't see any signs of smoking inside, though. If people live there, they keep it tidy -- this here may also be a smoking spot."

links.title: You: ""I saw the same brand of cigarettes..."
links.text: "I saw the same brand of cigarettes extinguished in Land's End." (Point west.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Could be a coincidence. Or -- the..."
links.text: "Could be a coincidence. Or -- the same person has visited Land's End and..." He looks around, "...here."

links.title: You: ""Someone's been smoking Tioumoutiri..."
links.text: "Someone's been smoking Tioumoutiri cigarettes. Not a lot of that around."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods. "The smoker's a clean pers..."
links.text: He nods. "The smoker's a clean person. I didn't see any signs of smoking inside. Keeps it tidy -- prefers to come out here to smoke."

links.title: You: ""Someone's been smoking Tioumoutiri..."
links.text: "Someone's been smoking Tioumoutiri cigarettes."

links.title: You: ""Someone's been smoking here.""
links.text: "Someone's been smoking here."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "The same rare brand... from Land's..."
links.text: The same rare brand... from Land's End, before. Interesting.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Contemporary Revacholians prefer Dr..."
links.text: Contemporary Revacholians prefer Drouin (a local blend from the southern islands) or Astra, the legendary cigarette from Graad. Tioumoutiri is favoured by older men for its paper filter tips, sweet smell, and added tar.

links.title: You: "Back off."
links.text: Back off.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Anything?""
links.text: "Anything?"

links.title: Mattress Nest: "A rain-soaked mattress on a concret..."
links.text: A rain-soaked mattress on a concrete slab. In front of it -- double embrasures -- firing slits like two eyes in the wall.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""That embrasure... What can you see..."
links.text: "That embrasure... What can you see through it?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A good place to hide. Cosy. Relati..."
links.text: "A good place to hide. Cosy. Relatively safe from the rain..." He pokes the mattress.

links.title: Cuno: ""Someone been hidin' here like a bi..."
links.text: "Someone been hidin' here like a bitch," he whispers. "Maybe  jerkin' off too?"

links.title: Logic: "A good place to hide. Relatively sa..."
links.text: A good place to hide. Relatively safe from the snow and the rain...

links.title: You: "Inspect the wall."
links.text: Inspect the wall.

links.title: Mattress Nest: "The springs screech as you lean on..."
links.text: The springs screech as you lean on the mattress and crane your neck to look out...

links.title: Inland Empire: "Trepidation. A tingling feeling in..."
links.text: Trepidation. A tingling feeling in your stomach...

links.title: Mattress Nest: "A small piece of Martinaise coastli..."
links.text: A small piece of Martinaise coastline opens up in the square in front of you -- like a tiny landscape painting, one kilometre across the water. The ruins look familiar.

links.title: You: "On the left..."
links.text: On the left...

links.title: Mattress Nest: "A towering skyscraper, its top floo..."
links.text: A towering skyscraper, its top floors shaved off by artillery fire -- Capeside Apartments: Rue de Saint Ghislaine 33A and 33B.

links.title: You: "And between the two..."
links.text: And between the two...

links.title: Mattress Nest: "The box-shaped silhouette of the Wh..."
links.text: The box-shaped silhouette of the Whirling-in-Rags. Its sloped roof. A tiny fleck of light catches your eye on the rooftop -- sunlight reflecting off the upstairs window of Klaasje's room.

links.title: You: ""Motherfucker.""
links.text: "Motherfucker."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What does that mean? Do you have l..."
links.text: "What does that mean? Do you have line of sight to the window?"

links.title: Perception (Sight): "More than that."
links.text: More than that.

links.title: You: ""Kim, with a pair of binoculars, I..."
links.text: "Kim, with a pair of binoculars, I would be able to see *inside* the room."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Whenever you wanted. Like your own..."
links.text: Whenever you wanted. Like your own little dollhouse...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""A pair of binoculars? Or a scope o..."
links.text: "A pair of binoculars? Or a scope of a *rifle*?" He points to the makeshift bed. "You'd be prone, lying on the mattress, barrel resting on the embrasure..."

links.title: You: ""Yes -- there's an opening between..."
links.text: "Yes -- there's an opening between 33A and 10. I can see to the roof."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can see it," he nods. "Through t..."
links.text: "I can see it," he nods. "Through the scope of a rifle. The shooter would be prone, lying on the mattress, barrel resting on the embrasure."

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Cheek against the cheek rest, hand..."
links.text: Cheek against the cheek rest, hand on the hair trigger. On a calm day like this...

links.title: You: ""Kim, I could make it -- I could ma..."
links.text: "Kim, I could make it -- I could make the shot."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Good." He pats you on the back, th..."
links.text: "Good." He pats you on the back, three small pats in a row. "I think we have it, detective. The origin of the shot. This is the *sniper's nest*."

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Affirmative."
links.text: Affirmative.

links.title: You: ""Finally.""
links.text: "Finally."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""In our defence -- nothing pointed..."
links.text: "In our defence -- nothing pointed here. Many, many leads pointed elsewhere."

links.title: You: ""You're right.""
links.text: "You're right."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He looks north, over the fortificat..."
links.text: He looks north, over the fortification. Then at the mattress.

links.title: Composure: "Then again... his face twitches."
links.text: Then again... his face twitches.

links.title: Empathy: "He's conflicted for a second. There..."
links.text: He's conflicted for a second. There's guilt there, it takes him a moment to rationalize it away.

links.title: You: ""Six people are dead. We could have..."
links.text: "Six people are dead. We could have prevented it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Don't beat yourself up, officer. W..."
links.text: "Don't beat yourself up, officer. We did not put guns in their hands, or get them drunk." He looks north, over the fortification, then adds:

links.title: Empathy: "The lieutenant pauses. Regret comes..."
links.text: The lieutenant pauses. Regret comes over him.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We will make up for it. Here. I fe..."
links.text: "We will make up for it. Here. I feel it."

links.title: You: ""Better late than never.""
links.text: "Better late than never."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He nods. "Nothing pointed here -- m..."
links.text: He nods. "Nothing pointed here -- many leads pointed elsewhere."

links.title: You: ""*Why* didn't we come here before?""
links.text: "*Why* didn't we come here before?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why? We don't go everywhere in a t..."
links.text: "Why? We don't go everywhere in a thousand metre radius of the crime scene. That's not procedure."

links.title: You: ""Boo-yah. Master cop work.""
links.text: "Boo-yah. Master cop work."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Why not? We have the weapon and ba..."
links.text: "Why not? We have the weapon and ballistics. As you say it's..." He looks north, over the fortification. "Pretty *boo-yah*."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It's only *moderately* effective c..."
links.text: "It's only *moderately* effective cop work until we have the weapon. It will not be, how do you say it..." He looks north, over the fortification. "*Boo-yah*, until we have that..."

links.title: You: "I don't want to boast..."
links.text: I don't want to boast...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I think we have it. The origin of..."
links.text: "I think we have it. The origin of the shot -- this is the *sniper's nest*." He pats you on the back, three small pats in a row.

links.title: You: ""There it is.""
links.text: "There it is."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Do you have line of sight to the w..."
links.text: "Do you have line of sight to the window?"

links.title: You: ""I can't be 100% certain, but...""
links.text: "I can't be 100% certain, but..."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What? Do you have line of sight to..."
links.text: "What? Do you have line of sight to the window?"

links.title: Perception (Sight): "What are you talking about -- "Can'..."
links.text: What are you talking about -- "Can't be certain?" It's certain.

links.title: You: ""Motherfucker.""
links.text: "Motherfucker."

links.title: Cuno: ""Motherfucker?" He sounds excited...."
links.text: "Motherfucker?" He sounds excited. "You seein' the window or not?"

links.title: Perception (Sight): "More than that."
links.text: More than that.

links.title: You: ""Cuno, with a pair of binoculars, I..."
links.text: "Cuno, with a pair of binoculars, I would be able to see *inside* the room."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno fucking knew it. This a snipe..."
links.text: "Cuno fucking knew it. This a sniper's nest, right? Fuckin' assassin action... Cuno *barely* understands what's happening -- but he likes the shit out of it."

links.title: You: ""Could the shooter still be... here?""
links.text: "Could the shooter still be... here?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Where?" He looks behind his back."
links.text: "Where?" He looks behind his back.

links.title: You: ""In Martinaise.""
links.text: "In Martinaise."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I have always assumed it's someone..."
links.text: "I have always assumed it's someone local." He nods.

links.title: Half Light: "He feels... uncomfortable suddenly."
links.text: He feels... uncomfortable suddenly.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""We should move. Now.""
links.text: "We should move. Now."

links.title: You: ""On this island.""
links.text: "On this island."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He does not answer, just nods. With..."
links.text: He does not answer, just nods. With his back hunched, he looks around once more and says...

links.title: You: ""Right *here*." (Point at the mattr..."
links.text: "Right *here*." (Point at the mattress.)

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""You think so?" he whispers, pointi..."
links.text: "You think so?" he whispers, pointing to the mattress. "We would *see* them if they were here."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Perhaps it's a..."
links.text: Perhaps it's a...

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, officer. It's not an *invisibl..."
links.text: "No, officer. It's not an *invisible* shooter. But..." He lowers his voice even further. "This island, on the other hand..."

links.title: You: ""You think he's here?""
links.text: "You think he's here?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Or *she*." He almost whispers. "We..."
links.text: "Or *she*." He almost whispers. "We should move."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""But." He lowers his voice again. "..."
links.text: "But." He lowers his voice again. "This island on the other hand..."

links.title: Cuno: ""Where?" Cuno looks around the smal..."
links.text: "Where?" Cuno looks around the small compartment-sized room.

links.title: You: ""In Martinaise.""
links.text: "In Martinaise."

links.title: Cuno: ""Yeah, detective Cuno thinks it's s..."
links.text: "Yeah, detective Cuno thinks it's some local asshole too. These people are rats..."

links.title: Half Light: "He feels... uncomfortable suddenly."
links.text: He feels... uncomfortable suddenly.

links.title: Cuno: ""Let's get a move on. We're out in..."
links.text: "Let's get a move on. We're out in the open here..."

links.title: You: ""On this island.""
links.text: "On this island."

links.title: Cuno: ""Right fucking on." He stops. A shu..."
links.text: "Right fucking on." He stops. A shudder.

links.title: You: ""Right *here*.""
links.text: "Right *here*."

links.title: Cuno: ""You see someone here?" He points t..."
links.text: "You see someone here?" He points to the mattress. "Fuckin' invisible shooter? Spooky shit..."

links.title: You: ""Yes -- there's an opening between..."
links.text: "Yes -- there's an opening between 33A and 10. I can see to the roof."

links.title: You: ""There it is.""
links.text: "There it is."

links.title: Cuno: ""There what is, the window?""
links.text: "There what is, the window?"

links.title: You: ""I can't be 100% certain, but...""
links.text: "I can't be 100% certain, but..."

links.title: Cuno: ""You see the window or not?""
links.text: "You see the window or not?"

links.title: Perception (Sight): "What are you talking about -- "Can'..."
links.text: What are you talking about -- "Can't be certain?"

links.title: Hand/Eye Coordination: "Cheek against the cheek rest, hand..."
links.text: Cheek against the cheek rest, hand on the hair trigger. On a calm day like this...

links.title: You: "I could take the shot."
links.text: I could take the shot.

links.title: Mattress Nest: "The wind blows suddenly. The clear..."
links.text: The wind blows suddenly. The clear surface of the water shudders. Yes. This is it.

links.title: Shivers: "In the North, something moves. Leav..."
links.text: In the North, something moves. Leaving circles on the water. Long stalks in the shallows...

links.title: You: "Is the shooter still here?"
links.text: Is the shooter still here?

links.title: Mattress Nest: "No answer comes. Not even a whisper..."
links.text: No answer comes. Not even a whisper on the water.

links.title: Shivers: "YES."
links.text: YES.

links.title: You: "This is where the shot came from..."
links.text: This is where the shot came from...

links.title: You: "...but not with 100% certainty."
links.text: ...but not with 100% certainty.

links.title: Mattress Nest: "The wind picks up slowly. The clear..."
links.text: The wind picks up slowly. The clear surface of the water shudders. Yes. This is it.

links.title: You: "On the right..."
links.text: On the right...

links.title: Mattress Nest: "The red chimney and collapsed rear..."
links.text: The red chimney and collapsed rear wall of the four-story tenement in front of the Whirling-in-Rags -- Rue de Saint Ghislaine 10.

links.title: You: "Got you. [Leave.]"
links.text: Got you. [Leave.]

links.title: Mattress Nest: "There's a firing slit in the wall i..."
links.text: There's a firing slit in the wall in front of you. Like a little window...

links.title: You: "Touch the concrete first."
links.text: Touch the concrete first.

links.title: Mattress Nest: "Quite old, and grimy from years wit..."
links.text: Quite old, and grimy from years without cleaning by anything other than the rain.

links.title: You: "Look through the hole in the concre..."
links.text: Look through the hole in the concrete.

links.title: You: "[Turn away.]"
links.text: [Turn away.]

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, wait." He points to the embras..."
links.text: "No, wait." He points to the embrasure. "This is important, I have a feeling... What can you see?"

links.title: Cuno: ""No, but what about..." He points t..."
links.text: "No, but what about..." He points to the embrasure. "What's out there?"

links.title: Visual Calculus: "No. You feel there's something impo..."
links.text: No. You feel there's something important here.  The embrasure. Look again...
